Purpose: Set the inform flags on the given player's cards.
informCard(int, String, char, String[]) - Method in class Table
Purpose: Set the card information and inform flags on the user's cards.
informColour(char) - Method in class Hand
Sets the colourKnown to true to each card object in cards that belongs to input colour
informColourUser(int, char) - Method in class Hand
Sets the user's card at the given index to the given colour
informNumber(char) - Method in class Hand
Sets the numberKnown to true to each card object in cards that belongs to input colour
informNumberUser(int, char) - Method in class Hand

informSelf(char, String) - Method in class GameModel
